---
title: Onboarding
---

Make sure you have completed the following activities before the first session:

1. Download and install [R](https://cran.biotools.fr/).
2. Download and install [RStudio](https://rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/#download).
3. Download and install [Git](https://git-scm.com/).
4. Create a [GitHub](https://github.com/) account.
5. Download and install [Slack](https://spb-methods.slack.com): You should have received an invitation email.
6. Join the course on [DataCamp](https://www.datacamp.com): You should have received an invitation email.

If all of these software do not yet make sense, don't worry; we'll cover them in the course.
